wordpressPost.title: Design
wordpressPost.content: Some websites out there simply have a fascinating and breath taking design. They are few and far between and nonsurprisingly almost always a personal website of some graphic artist trying to make themselves known or simply to share their stuff. Maria J. Williams seems to be one such person. The website is simply the best design I've ever had the honour of noticing.
